=============
bsif.bashDist
=============

.. contents::
   :depth: 3
..

Overview
========

BSIF-bashDist: A wrapper for packaging of BSIF bash files for insertion
into BISOS.

Support
=======

| For support, criticism, comments and questions; please contact the
  author/maintainer
| `Mohsen Banan <http://mohsen.1.banan.byname.net>`__ at:
  http://mohsen.1.banan.byname.net/contact

Installation
============

::

    sudo pip install bsif.bashDist

Usage
=====

::

    /usr/local/bin/bx-bases-bash.py
